resources.description: A multi-service multi-access protocol based on gated-polling control (MSGPMA) for ad hoc network was presented. Packets with different service arrive at user terminal with different arrival rate, and could be transmitted with different transmission time. The average queue length and approximated mean waiting time of MSGPMA protocol were obtained. The results show that the simulation is in concordance with the theoretical analysis.
resources.name: Analysis of Multi-Service Multi-Access Protocol Based on Gated-Polling Control for Ad Hoc Network

name: analysis-of-multi-service-multi-access-protocol-based-on-gated-polling-control-for-ad-hoc-network
notes: A multi-service multi-access protocol based on gated-polling control (MSGPMA) for ad hoc network was presented. Packets with different service arrive at user terminal with different arrival rate, and could be transmitted with different transmission time. The average queue length and approximated mean waiting time of MSGPMA protocol were obtained. The results show that the simulation is in concordance with the theoretical analysis. http://www.sjie.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=1784
title: Analysis of Multi-Service Multi-Access Protocol Based on Gated-Polling Control for Ad Hoc Network
